name: CFNumberFormatterPadPosition
desc: Type for constants specifying how numbers should be padded.

items.name: case afterPrefix
items.desc: Specifies the number of padding characters after the prefix.

items.name: case afterSuffix
items.desc: Specifies the number of padding characters after the suffix.

items.name: case beforePrefix
items.desc: Specifies the number of padding characters before the prefix.

items.name: case beforeSuffix
items.desc: Specifies the number of padding characters before the suffix.
